data.text: @MikeCrapo Senator,  I'm on my knees begging you to use your influence to pass the Save Act.  On my knees.  Do it for your kids, grandkids, anyone you love.  Our country will never recover trust if you don't.  Each election will be questioned. Each leader will not be trusted.

@MikeCrapo TRUMP THE RACIST SCUMBAG. 
FUCK TRUMP THE RACIST SCUMBAG. https://t.co/9IkjdP2nsg
@MikeCrapo They should share Trump's Truth Social post featuring our former President and his wife.  Make everyone really proud.
